Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've been reading the mission reports on my phone for a while now. Cool stuff. I'm here mainly to post my own mission reports, and maybe if anyone is interested to post my craft files. I've built one SSTO I'm fairly proud of, it carries 8 Kerbils. You can see it in my mission report once I get around to collecting all the images etcetera.

KSP is one of those games I keep coming back to, and then forget about for months. But I always come back! So yeah, hi.

I'm kind of the same way too, swinging between games. But it's still mostly KSP.

Anyways...

Welcome to the forums!
